title: Lambence

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose to illuminate the streets the following night, letting all players see who visited them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Non-good roles will be informed the the streets are illuminated at the beginning of the night.
- Players who visited multiple players will only show up as having visited their first target (or a random one, if not applicable).
- You will learn the roles of all players who visit you instead of their names.
- You may only use your ability three times.

desc:
